sentences.sentence: Cultivating such qualities will help you realise your full potential.
sentences.translation: 培养这样的品质将有助你充分发挥你的潜力。

sentences.sentence: Cultivating positive interpersonal relationships helped him expel solitary feelings.
sentences.translation: 培养积极的人际关系有助于他排除孤独感。

sentences.sentence: I owe my parents a great deal because they have devoted most of their time and energy to cultivating me.
sentences.translation: 我非常感谢我的父母，因为他们用了大部分时间和精力培养我。
